00016 W.Skill = function(args){
00017   // default action
00018   this.name = 'hide';
00019   this.img = 'module/darwin/image/blank.gif';
00020   this.east = '0:0';
00021   this.west = '0:0';
00022   this.north = '0:0';
00023   this.south = '0:0';
00024 
00025   this.dir = 'south';  // current direction
00026   this.frame = 0;  // current frame
00027   // extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00028   for(var i in args)
00029     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00030 
00031   this.img = W.path + this.img;
00032   this.east = splitter(this.east);
00033   this.west = splitter(this.west);
00034   this.north = splitter(this.north);
00035   this.south = splitter(this.south);
00036 
00037   // split by comma
00038   function splitter(str){
00039     var tmp = str.split(',');
00040     var arr = [];
00041     for(var i = 0; i < tmp.length; ++i){
00042       tmp[i] = tmp[i].split(':');
00043       arr[i] = {};
00044       arr[i].top = tmp[i][0];
00045       arr[i].left = tmp[i][1];
00046     }
00047     return arr;
00048   };
00049 };

00060 W.Skill.prototype.animate = function(){
00061   // rotate frames
00062   if(this.frame >= this[this.dir].length - 1){
00063     this.frame = 0;
00064   }else ++this.frame;
00065   // flip frame
00066   this.creature.img.style.top = -this[this.creature.dir][this.frame].top +'px';
00067   this.creature.img.style.left = -this[this.creature.dir][this.frame].left +'px';
00068 
00069   var status = 'act:'+ this.creature.act;
00070   status += ', dir:'+ this.creature.dir;
00071   status += ', speed:'+ this.creature.speed;
00072   status += ', top:'+ this.creature.img.style.top;
00073   status += ', left:'+ this.creature.img.style.left;
00074   status += ', body.top:'+ this.creature.body.style.top;
00075   status += ', body.left:'+ this.creature.body.style.left;
00076   status += ', body.width:'+ this.creature.body.style.width;
00077   status += ', body.height:'+ this.creature.body.style.height;
00078   window.status = status;
00079 };
